CodeLingo transforms cryptic Java error messages into plain, human-readable explanations directly in your console. Perfect for students, junior developers, or anyone tired of deciphering NullPointerExceptions.


âœ¨ Features

  • Runtime Error Analysis: Instantly explains NullPointerException, IndexOutOfBoundsException, ArithmeticException, and more.
  • Compilation Help: Detects missing semicolons ;, invalid statements, and missing symbols during build.
  • Console Integration: No side panels needed! Explanations appear right below the error in your Run console.
  • Actionable Solutions: Doesn't just say what happened, but suggests how to fix it (e.g., "Add a null check").

ğŸš€ How to use

  1. Install the plugin.
  2. Run any Java program that produces an error.
  3. Look at the console output for the [CodeLingo] section.
